description: Daria observes citywide disruptions and increasing public distress due to malfunctioning services linked to the BCI.
Daria discreetly coordinates with trusted technicians to stabilize critical systems, focusing on minimizing disruptions in health data flow.
The Council publicly acknowledges ongoing technical issues with BCI, promising swift resolution to restore normalcy.
Widespread BCI failures lead to severe disruptions in transport and public services, akin to blackout conditions.
An emergency Council meeting is convened, where faction members argue over the causes of the BCI failures and seek solutions.
Daria continues her covert stabilization efforts, preventing system-wide collapse but leaving deeper issues unresolved.
Public services remain erratic as officials assure citizens that technical teams are working around the clock to stabilize the BCI.
A leaked report reveals subsystems' vulnerabilities stem from outdated redundancy protocols, intensifying accountability debates among factions.
